duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative support to customers regarding insurance, billing questions, policy changes, and other account inquiries.
Obtain and maintain a Personal Lines Property & Casualty (P&C) license as part of the training and a requirement for the role.
Communicate with internal and external customers about intermediate underwriting guidelines, policies, and marketing initiatives to service customer accounts.
Utilize competencies and skills to provide a positive customer experience and proactively share knowledge.
Analyzing, clarifying, and resolving intermediate policy and account related questions from customers.
Participate in in-house or outside insurance/industry related courses/seminars to expand product/system knowledge.
Model Farmers core values and meet performance level standards as outlined in performance objectives.
Consistently meet or exceed performance measurement goals and suggest innovative process changes to support business practices.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred. Completion of required additional training.
